thread.section_title: Le Relais Montmartre - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Little, nice, quiet, excellent value for money
thread.title_full: Little, nice, quiet, excellent value for money - Review of Le Relais Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gbmonteverde
title: Little, nice, quiet, excellent value for money
text: Just off busy Montmartre in a nice little street, very quiet, very nice rooms with lovely and warm decor. French style. Bathroom nothing major but ok. Very good bed. The breakfast location and iquality not at the level of the rooms. Overall a very nice hotel
